title: D5 last season ADC main LF team to climb with
body:
I am AD main and also able to play JG as well. Currently looking for team to steadily climb with. Have discord and available every night
I can play all champs in meta right now. Seriously with high commitment with team
Just add me in-game 
Thanks 
Äńh ßánh ßèö

replies.body: BIO: Im a D5 player (S5), my account was recently terminated, not banned, terminated. Why you ask? because it was hacked, fraudulent credit cards were used on my account so now I'm a level 29 trying to keep my skill in tact while playing up to level 30 and hopefully getting into diamond or a LCS team. I main support and sometimes Adc and thats about it.
